name: tangga_lagu
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool kotak7.
Tool description: Api Musik Kotak7
API description: Fetches the top tracks from the specified music chart.

index.description: The starting index of the track list.

num.description: The number of tracks to retrieve.

country.description: The country of the music chart.

is_id.description: The unique identifier for the specific music chart.
